author: jmarino
msg: support for multiplicity for system and Java components; test case refactor related to support; support for multiplicity in JavaScript components still needs to be added

author: niallp
msg: Port to 1.2.x branch. Implement unspecified method in EventDispatchAction and EventActionDispatcher and remove check/exception from getMethodName() method, which was preventing "unspecified" from ever being called - thanks to Paul Benedict for pointing this out.
Also, remove unecessary getParameter() method (duplicates inherited version) from EventDispatchAction and EventActionDispatcher.

author: niallp
msg: Implement unspecified method in EventDispatchAction and EventActionDispatcher and remove check/exception from getMethodName() method, which was preventing "unspecified" from ever being called - thanks to Paul Benedict for pointing this out.
Also, remove unecessary getParameter() method (duplicates inherited version) from EventDispatchAction and EventActionDispatcher.

author: bayard
msg: Removed clone() method - it was incorrectly implemented, but more importantly there is no obvious reason for Option to be cloneable. This resolves #28482 and #29908

author: carnold
msg: Bug 38024: Restored PatternLayout.createPatternLayout for log4j 1.2 compat
